methods.name: getAccountInfo

parameters.description: Pubkey of account to query, as base-58 encoded string

parameters.name: options
parameters.description:
Configuration object containing the following optional
fields:

result.description: Account information associated with provided Pubkey or null if not found

methods.name: getBalance
methods.description: Returns the balance of the account of provided Pubkey

parameters.description: Pubkey of account to query, as base-58 encoded string

parameters.name: commitment
parameters.description: Commitment; "processed" is not supported. If parameter not provided, the default is "finalized".

methods.name: getBlockHeight
methods.description: Returns the current block height of the node

parameters.name: commitment
parameters.description: Commitment; "processed" is not supported. If parameter not provided, the default is "finalized".

result.description: Current block height

methods.name: getBlockProduction
methods.description: Returns recent block production information from the current or previous epoch.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Configuration object containing the following optional fields:

result.description: recent block production

methods.name: getBlockCommitment
methods.description: Returns commitment for particular block

parameters.name: block
parameters.description: block, identified by Slot

result.description: Block commitment, or null if block is not found

methods.name: getBlocks
methods.description: Returns a list of confirmed blocks between two slots

parameters.name: startSlot
parameters.description: start_slot, as u64 integer

parameters.name: endSlot
parameters.description: end_slot, as u64 integer

parameters.name: commitment
parameters.description: Commitment; "processed" is not supported. If parameter not provided, the default is "finalized".

result.description: An array of u64 integers listing confirmed blocks between start_slot and either end_slot, if provided, or latest confirmed block, inclusive. Max range allowed is 500,000 slots

methods.name: getBlocksWithLimit
methods.description: Returns a list of confirmed blocks starting at the given slot

parameters.name: startSlot
parameters.description: start_slot, as u64 integer

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: limit, as u64 integer

parameters.name: commitment
parameters.description: Commitment; "processed" is not supported. If parameter not provided, the default is "finalized".

result.description: The result field will be an array of u64 integers listing confirmed blocks starting at start_slot for up to limit blocks, inclusive.

methods.name: getBlockTime
methods.description: Returns the estimated production time of a block.

parameters.name: block
parameters.description: block, identified by Slot

result.description: estimated production time, as Unix timestamp (seconds since the Unix epoch)

methods.name: getClusterNodes

methods.name: getFees
methods.description: Returns a recent block hash from the ledger, a fee schedule that can be used to compute the cost of submitting a transaction using it, and the last slot in which the blockhash will be valid.

parameters.name: commitment
parameters.description: Commitment; "processed" is not supported. If parameter not provided, the default is "finalized".

result.description: Recent block hash from the ledger

methods.name: getFirstAvailableBlock
methods.description: Returns the slot of the lowest confirmed block that has not been purged from the ledger

result.description: Slot of the lowest confirmed block

methods.name: getGenesisHash
methods.description: Returns the genesis hash

result.description: Genesis hash

methods.name: getHealth
methods.description:
Returns the current health of the node.

If one or more --known-validator arguments are provided to solana-validator, "ok" is returned when the node has within HEALTH_CHECK_SLOT_DISTANCE slots of the highest known validator, otherwise an error is returned. "ok" is always returned if no known validators are provided.

result.description: If the node is healthy: "ok" If the node is unhealthy, a JSON RPC error response is returned. The specifics of the error response are UNSTABLE and may change in the future

methods.name: getIdentity
methods.description: Returns the identity pubkey for the current node

result.description: The identity pubkey of the current node (as a base-58 encoded string)

methods.name: getLeaderSchedule
methods.description: Returns the leader schedule for an epoch

parameters.name: slot
parameters.description:
Fetch the leader schedule for the epoch that corresponds to the provided slot.
If unspecified, the leader schedule for the current epoch is fetched

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Configuration object containing the following field:

result.description: The result field will be a dictionary of validator identities, as base-58 encoded strings, and their corresponding leader slot indices as values (indices are relative to the first slot in the requested epoch) or null if the requested epoch is not found

result.description: Max slot seen from retransmit stage.

methods.name: getRecentPerformanceSamples
methods.description: Returns a list of recent performance samples, in reverse slot order. Performance samples are taken every 60 seconds and include the number of transactions and slots that occur in a given time window.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: number of samples to return (maximum 720)

result.description: Performance samples

methods.name: getSnapshotSlot
methods.description: Returns the highest slot that the node has a snapshot for

methods.name: getSignaturesForAddress

parameters.name: pubKey
parameters.description: account address as base-58 encoded string

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Configuration object containing the following fields:

result.description: An array of transaction signature information, ordered from newest to oldest transaction

methods.name: getSignatureStatuses
methods.description: Returns the statuses of a list of signatures. Unless the searchTransactionHistory configuration parameter is included, this method only searches the recent status cache of signatures, which retains statuses for all active slots plus MAX_RECENT_BLOCKHASHES rooted slots.

parameters.name: signatures
parameters.description: An array of transaction signatures to confirm, as base-58 encoded strings

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Configuration object containing the following field:

result.description: The status of the given signature, or null of the signature does not exist

parameters.name: commitment

result.description: Transaction Signature of airdrop, as base-58 encoded string

methods.name: sendTransaction
methods.description:
Submits a signed transaction to the cluster for processing.

This method does not alter the transaction in any way; it relays the transaction created by clients to the node as-is.

If the node's rpc service receives the transaction, this method immediately succeeds, without waiting for any confirmations. A successful response from this method does not guarantee the transaction is processed or confirmed by the cluster.

While the rpc service will reasonably retry to submit it, the transaction could be rejected if transaction's recent_blockhash expires before it lands.

Use getSignatureStatuses to ensure a transaction is processed and confirmed.

Before submitting, the following preflight checks are performed:

The transaction signatures are verified
The transaction is simulated against the bank slot specified by the preflight commitment. On failure an error will be returned. Preflight checks may be disabled if desired. It is recommended to specify the same commitment and preflight commitment to avoid confusing behavior.
The returned signature is the first signature in the transaction, which is used to identify the transaction (transaction id). This identifier can be easily extracted from the transaction data before submission.

parameters.name: transaction
parameters.description: fully-signed Transaction, as encoded string

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Configuration object containing the following field:

result.description: First Transaction Signature embedded in the transaction, as base-58 encoded string (transaction id)

methods.name: simulateTransaction
methods.description: Simulate sending a transaction

parameters.name: transaction
parameters.description: Transaction, as an encoded string. The transaction must have a valid blockhash, but is not required to be signed.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Configuration object containing the following fields:

result.description: Transaction status

parameters.description: start_slot, as u64 integer

parameters.name: commitment
parameters.description: Commitment; "processed" is not supported. If parameter not provided, the default is "finalized".

methods.name: getConfirmedBlocksWithLimit
methods.description: Returns a list of confirmed blocks starting at the given slot

parameters.name: startSlot
parameters.description: start_slot, as u64 integer

parameters.name: limit

methods.name: getConfirmedSignaturesForAddress2
methods.description: Returns confirmed signatures for transactions involving an address backwards in time from the provided signature or most recent confirmed block

parameters.name: pubKey
parameters.description: account address as base-58 encoded string

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Configuration object containing the following fields:

fields.name: limit
fields.description: maximum transaction signatures to return (between 1 and 1,000, default: 1,000).

fields.name: before
fields.description: start searching backwards from this transaction signature. If not provided the search starts from the top of the highest max confirmed block.

fields.name: until
fields.description: search until this transaction signature, if found before limit reached.

fields.name: commitment
fields.description: Commitment; "processed" is not supported. If parameter not provided, the default is "finalized".

result.description: An array of transaction signature information, ordered from newest to oldest transaction

methods.description: Returns transaction details for a confirmed transaction

parameters.name: signature
parameters.description: transaction signature as base-58 encoded string

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Configuration object containing the following optional fields:

result.description: Transaction details for said signature or null of not found
